body.p: The purpose of a summary element is to have a nontrivial description of a module that is available without investigating the module itself. A module-element may contain only one summary-element.

tr.td: An uri to a file containing the summary. If location is set, the content in the element is ignored. The location is corrected for pathfragments.

body.p: The content of a summary element may be a simple text or any legal XML-fragment wrapped as CDATA. All addresses in a summary element must either be absolute or relative to the module that owns the summary.
body.pre: A wonderfull page with all essentials ]]>
